biweekly.property

Class UtcOffsetProperty

  • java.lang.Object
    • biweekly.property.ICalProperty
      • biweekly.property.ValuedProperty<UtcOffset>
        • biweekly.property.UtcOffsetProperty
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Timezone, TimezoneOffsetFrom, TimezoneOffsetTo

    public class UtcOffsetProperty
extends ValuedProperty<UtcOffset>
    Represents a property whose value is a timezone offset.
    Author:
    Michael Angstadt

      • validate

        protected void validate(List<ICalComponent> components,
            ICalVersion version,
            List<Warning> warnings)
        Description copied from class: ICalProperty

        Checks the property for data consistency problems or deviations from the spec.

        This method should be overridden by child classes that wish to provide validation logic. The default implementation of this method does nothing.

        Overrides:
        validate in class ValuedProperty<UtcOffset>
        Parameters:
        components - the hierarchy of components that the property belongs to
        version - the version to validate against
        warnings - the list to add the warnings to
